name: Dirty Work
description:
Play as a bunch of rats in a trench coat trying to take out the rat king's targets. Literally. Switch between rat swarm and trench coat forms to kill the marks. 

This is very much a WIP now! Didn't have much time to work on it because jobs, and life, and stuff. Just think of this as a vertical slice.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q - Open Quest Tab (to find instructions)

Space - Jump

Tab - Switch forms

Left Click - Grab (can be done in both swarm and trench coat forms)

Team:

Gavin: Programming & Design https://gavin-camlin.itch.io/

Vlad: Art & Programming https://offworlddemon.itch.io/

Robby: Design https://robbytaku.itch.io/
